tag_gdma_linkedlist_status Struct Reference

  • IMG_BOOL bCircularList

Detailed Description

This describes the current status of the linked list transfer. This structure is not used when operating in single shot mode.

Example linked list using 5 of 7 available transfer descriptors. Head, Tail and Last indices shown. Numbers show order in which operations were submitted. 'x' indicates an unused descriptor.

------------------------------------------------------------------- | | | |-----| |-----| |-----| |-----| |-----| |-----| |-----| | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | |->| 4th |->| 5th | | x | | x | | 1st |->| 2nd |->| 3rd |--| | | | | | | | | | | | | | | |-----| |-----| |-----| |-----| |-----| |-----| |-----| ^ ^ ^ | | | Last Tail Head (=1) (=2) (=4)

In the example diagram above, NoOfListElements = 7 and ListElementsInUse = 5
